main event: A civilian observer reported seeing an object emitting a pulsating bluish-green light in November 1947.
interesting points: The object was seen flying in a northwest direction., There is no mention of the object's speed, altitude, or size., The observer's exact location was between Boise and Mountain Home., The object was described as having a brilliant green color., The report did not provide sufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: an object emitting a bluish-green light
